title: Ahmadiya
description: Remains of an ancient village in the Golan that produced Greek and Hebrew Inscriptions probably associated with a synagogue.  The site is described by Urman et al. as occupying "two low hills near a group of springs about two kilometers northeast of QasÌ£rin."

properties.description: Representative location based on Tabula Imperii Romani.
properties.title: Tabula Imperii Romani location of Ahmadiya (Ahmadiyye)
